name: jquery-mousewheel
description: A jQuery plugin that adds cross-browser mouse wheel support.

scripts.minify: node --input-type=module -e "import { minify } from './build/minify.mjs'; minify( { dir: '.', filename: 'jquery.mousewheel.js' } )"
scripts.test:browser: npm run build && npm run test:unit -- -b chrome -b firefox --headless
scripts.test:chrome: npm run build && npm run test:unit -- -v -b chrome --headless
scripts.test:edge: npm run build && npm run test:unit -- -v -b edge --headless
scripts.test:firefox: npm run build && npm run test:unit -- -v -b firefox --headless
scripts.test:ie: npm run build && npm run test:unit -- -v -b ie
scripts.test:safari: npm run build && npm run test:unit -- -b safari
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run lint && npm run test:browser
